title: Biggest possible clock display (at night) on Pixel Stand
content:
I don't sleep with my glasses on and my Pixel Stand is at the end of, not next to, my bed so I could really do with the clock that shows when my Pixel 3 XL is in the stand being HUGE. 

Ideally I'd like to have the phone on its side with pretty much the whole display taken up by the time display. 

Is this possible either via settings or another App?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
